ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Safe but secret
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Oh please, you sound like a witchfinder.  Provide a concrete example where you point would matter. If there s really a forest it can t be hard to see.

Elliotte Harold wrote:

> I can see arguments on both sides of the question. However, I'm a little
> surprised at the amount of effort I'm having to expend to get people to
> consider the question at all. The trouble people are going to evade it
> suggests to me that this is a very uncomfortable point for a lot of
> folks, and maybe the REST model (or at least HTTP) has some trouble here.

Oh please, you sound like a witchfinder.  Provide a concrete example 
where you point would matter. If there's really a forest it can't be 
hard to see.

cheers
Bill
